name: Contextual-rnn-gan
tagline: Repository for the paper : Contextual-RNN-GAN for Diagrammatic Abstract Reasoning
body: # GENERATIVE RNN-GAN Generator ----- * In the forward pass there is no change the Generator is just a simple RNN * In the backward pass instead of the standard backpropagation through time , the error is backpropagated using the gradient of the Discriminator predicting the counterfeit correctly/incorrectly Discriminator ---- At every step of the RNN-GAN , the generations from the Generator has to be saved and then the Discriminator has to be trained on the actual outputs and the outputs generated by the RNN-GAN RNN-GAN --- The discriminator is a MLP which takes a generated image and judges whether it is from the data or fake ( generated by the generator) * The model generates real looking images from the dataset not necessarily imposed that the timestep should be accurate * th scripts/train.lua --rnn_size 300 --hidden_D 250 --model gru Context RNN-GAN ---- Context RNN-GAN incorporates context for the timestep as the image(correct) previous timestep and this is incorporated into the discriminator(as an RNN) to tell whether the generated image is the correct image for the particular timestep * The model generates real looking images to generate images accurate according to the particular timestep * th scripts/train_coupled.lua --rnn_size 500 --dropout 0 --num_layers 2 --hidden_D 500 --model gru Some Generations ----
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
